content.introduction: This proposal covers the complete development and deployment of a professional corporate website for Explorers 33 Group, including all necessary technical implementation and initial support.

categories.name: Website Development
items: Fully responsive corporate website optimized for all devices
Custom layouts: Home, About, Services, Projects, Articles, Contact, Legal
Interactive service showcase with detailed descriptions
Blog module built from scratch with public REST API
Team member profiles and expertise highlights

categories.name: Technical Implementation
items: SEO optimization for improved search visibility
Performance optimization for fast loading times
Mobile responsiveness across all device sizes

categories.name: Deployment & Support
items: Post-launch technical support for 1 week* - see LSO
